name: Forgotten Condom
description:
I always was curious to investigate the potential educational games, while keeping the core gameplay fun. Forgotten condom as its name represents, is a collection of mini-games based, similar to the famous "Dumb Ways to Die".
Although the idea and our target audience which was teens, seemed reasonable, the production stops due to a shortage of funds. My original plan was to get some support from UNADIS and NGOs which was not successful.
